About Me.

Hi, I'm Amy!

I am a first-year student at the University of Michigan studying Computer Science and Robotics. I'm a product studio engineer at V1 Michigan and a member of the Michigan Student Artificial Intelligence Lab.

I love experimenting with new technology. My research interests broadly lie in the areas of machine learning and AI, more specifically in natural language processing.

In my free time, I enjoy playing violin with the Michigan Pops Orchestra, crosswords, and vlogging!

Feel free to reach out to chat about anything!
